<<<api>>>: Iterator.next
<<<code>>>: for(Iterator<Map.Entry<String, Integer>> it = map.entrySet().iterator(); it.hasNext(); ){
i = i + 1;
names.add(it.next().getValue() + " = " + it.next().getKey());
}
<<<explanation>>>: You can use the Iterator.next() method to get the next Map.Entry in the iteration and access its value and key.
